text: Hi, I'm in a situation where I require a sort of nested `mapreduce` function, on arrays with different nesting levels, but of the same element type. I already have a nested version of `eltype` and `copyto!` but I can't code a mapreduce function on this case. Ideally, one way to do this is via a nested `flatten`, but I don't know where to find such function, any ideas?
